00126 struct jmi_opt_sim_t{
00127         jmi_t *jmi;                      // jmi_t struct
00128         int n_x;                         // Number of variables
00129         int n_e;                         // Number of elements in mesh
00130         jmi_real_t *hs;                    // Normalized element lengths in mesh (sum(h[i]=1)
00131         int hs_free;                      // Free element lengths
00132         int *tp_e;                         // Element indices for time points
00133         jmi_real_t* tp_tau;                       // Taus for time points within elements
00134         jmi_real_t *x;                    // x vector.
00135         jmi_real_t *x_lb;                 // Lower bounds for variables
00136         jmi_real_t *x_ub;                 // Upper bound for variables
00137         jmi_real_t *x_init;               // Initial starting point
00138         int dg_n_nz;
00139         int dh_n_nz;
00140         int *dg_row;
00141         int *dg_col;
00142         int *dh_row;
00143         int *dh_col;
00144         jmi_opt_sim_get_dimensions_t get_dimensions;
00145         jmi_opt_sim_get_interval_spec_t get_interval_spec;
00146         jmi_opt_sim_f_t f;
00147         jmi_opt_sim_df_t df;
00148         jmi_opt_sim_h_t h;
00149         jmi_opt_sim_dh_t dh;
00150         jmi_opt_sim_g_t g;
00151         jmi_opt_sim_dg_t dg;
00152         int n_g;                          // Number of inequality constraints
00153         int n_h;                          // Number of equality constraints
00154         jmi_opt_sim_get_bounds_t get_bounds;
00155         jmi_opt_sim_get_initial_t get_initial;
00156         jmi_opt_sim_g_nz_indices_t dg_nz_indices;
00157         jmi_opt_sim_h_nz_indices_t dh_nz_indices;
00158         jmi_opt_sim_write_file_matlab_t write_file_matlab;
00159 };
